game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time has broken, fragments of eternity have scattered across the land. As a temporal archaeologist, you must uncover the secrets behind this cataclysm and restore balance to the timestream.
game.beginning: Your journey begins in the once-great city of Eldrador, now shrouded in an eerie mist. Rumors speak of a powerful artifact hidden within the ancient ruins, one that could hold the key to repairing the fabric of time. But you're not alone in your quest – a rival treasure hunter, the enigmatic Lyra, is hot on your heels.
game.ending: After navigating treacherous landscapes and battling against rogue temporal entities, you finally reach the heart of the timestream: the Echoing Cathedral. There, you'll discover that Lyra's motivations are more complex than you ever imagined. Together, you must confront the mastermind behind the time distortion – a being known only as 'The Architect' – in a battle to shape the course of eternity itself.
